description: AS-01 serves as the primary District Transport Office (DTO) for the Kamrup Metropolitan district and the state capital region. It is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and enforcement of transport regulations in Guwahati, one of the most populous cities in Northeast India.
address: District Transport Office, NH-37, Betkuchi, Near Honda Showroom, Guwahati, Assam

description: The AS-02 District Transport Office serves the Nagaon district in Assam. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and ensuring compliance with motor vehicle regulations in one of the state's most populous and centrally located districts.
address: District Transport Office, Near ASTC Campus, Nagaon, Assam

description: AS-03 is the designated RTO code for the Jorhat District Transport Office in Assam. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and transport permit management for the Jorhat region.
address: District Transport Office, Rajabari, Jorhat, Assam

description: AS-04 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Sivasagar district in Assam. It handles vehicle registration, road tax collection, and the issuance of driving licenses for the historic region known for its Ahom dynasty landmarks.
address: District Transport Office, Dorika Par Namtial Pathar, Sivasagar, Assam

description: The AS-05 RTO functions as the District Transport Office (DTO) for Golaghat, Assam. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and the implementation of the Motor Vehicles Act across the district, including areas near Kaziranga National Park.
address: District Transport Office, Arengapara, Near Dhansiri Bridge, G.D. Road, Golaghat, Assam

description: The AS-06 District Transport Office serves the Dibrugarh district, a major tea-producing and industrial hub in Upper Assam. It manages vehicle registrations, commercial permits, and driving licenses for one of the most significant economic zones in the state.
address: District Transport Office, Near Lakhmi Nath Bezbaruah Park, Dibrugarh, Assam

description: The AS-07 RTO serves the Lakhimpur district in North Assam, headquartered in North Lakhimpur. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permit issuance for the entire district under the Assam Transport Department.
address: District Transport Office, Chinatolia, P.O. North Lakhimpur, Dist. Lakhimpur, Assam

description: AS-08 RTO is the official registration authority for the Dima Hasao district in Assam, headquartered in the town of Haflong. It handles vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and transport permit management for the entire hill district.
address: M.V. Branch, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Dima Hasao, Haflong, Assam

description: AS-09 RTO represents the District Transport Office (DTO) of the Karbi Anglong district in Assam. Located in Diphu, this office handles motor vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport tax collection for one of the state's largest and most significant hill districts.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer (DTO), Diphu Town, Near DC Office, P.O. & P.S. Diphu, Karbi Anglong, Assam

description: The AS-10 RTO serves the Karimganj district in Assam and functions as the District Transport Office (DTO). It is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations within the Barak Valley region. The office plays a critical role in managing transportation services near the international border with Bangladesh.
address: Settlement Road, Steamer Ghat, Karimganj Town, Assam

description: The District Transport Office (DTO) in Silchar is the administrative body for vehicle registration and transport services in the Cachar district. It serves as a vital transport hub for the Barak Valley region, handling driving licenses, permits, and road safety enforcement.
address: District Transport Office, Silchar, Cachar, Assam

description: The AS-12 District Transport Office (DTO) is located in Tezpur and serves as the primary regulatory body for vehicle-related services in the Sonitpur district. It facilitates vehicle registrations, license issuances, and monitors the implementation of transport laws in this part of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Tezpur, Sonitpur, Assam

description: The AS-13 RTO, officially known as the District Transport Office (DTO) Darrang, is located in the headquarters of Mangaldoi. It is responsible for all vehicle registration, license issuance, and transport-related administrative services within the Darrang district of Assam.
address: O/O DTO, A.S.T.C. Office Complex, Mangaldoi, Darrang, Assam

description: AS-14 is the regional transport code for the Nalbari District Transport Office in Assam. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and road tax collection for the region, serving as a key administrative center for the North-Bank of the Brahmaputra.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Barama Road, Nalbari, Assam

description: AS-15 is the Regional Transport Office code for the Barpeta district in Assam. It operates under the District Transport Office (DTO) and is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and enforcement of transport regulations within the district's boundaries.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Kumarhati, P.O. Barpeta, District Barpeta, Assam

description: The AS-16 District Transport Office (DTO) serves the Kokrajhar district, the administrative headquarters of the Bodoland Territorial Region (BTR) in Assam. It handles all statutory functions under the Motor Vehicles Act, including vehicle registration, permit issuance, and the licensing of drivers within its jurisdiction.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, P.O. Kokrajhar, District Kokrajhar, Assam

description: The AS-17 RTO serves the Dhubri district in Assam, operating as the District Transport Office (DTO). It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licensing, and monitoring road safety in this border region of Lower Assam.
address: District Transport Office, Guru Teg Bahadur Road, Bidyapara, Dhubri, Assam

description: The AS-18 RTO serves the Goalpara district in Assam, functioning as the District Transport Office (DTO). It handles essential transport services including vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and road tax collection for the region.
address: District Transport Office, Bhalukdubi, Near District Court, Goalpara, Assam

description: The AS-19 RTO is the District Transport Office (DTO) serving the Bongaigaon district in Assam. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and road tax collection, playing a vital role in the industrial and transport infrastructure of the Lower Assam region.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, N Salmara - Bongaigaon Rd, Bongaigaon, Assam

description: AS-20 is a specialized RTO code reserved exclusively for vehicles owned and operated by the Assam State Transport Corporation (ASTC). Unlike standard RTOs that serve specific geographical districts for the public, this code is used for state-run buses and official ASTC transit vehicles across the entire state of Assam.
address: ASTC Headquarters, Paltan Bazar, Guwahati, Assam

description: AS-21 is the Regional Transport Office for the Morigaon district in Central Assam. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and the enforcement of motor vehicle acts and rules within the district.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, Morigaon, Assam

description: The AS-22 RTO serves the Dhemaji district in Assam, operating as a District Transport Office (DTO). It is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and enforcement of transport regulations within its jurisdiction in the northeastern part of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Bharali Chowk, Dhemaji, Assam

description: AS-23 is the District Transport Office serving the Tinsukia district in the northeastern state of Assam. It is a critical hub for vehicle registration and licensing in a region known for its significant tea production and industrial activities.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, A.T. Road, Tinsukia, Assam

description: The AS-24 RTO is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Hailakandi in Assam. It manages all local vehicle registrations, driving license examinations, and ensures compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act across the district.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer (DTO), Mission Road, Hailakandi, Assam

description: AS-25 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Kamrup Rural district of Assam, headquartered in Amingaon. It handles vehicle registration, licensing, and road tax collection for areas surrounding Guwahati that fall outside the Metropolitan jurisdiction. This office is crucial for managing rural transport logistics and ensuring regulatory compliance across the district.
address: District Transport Office, Kamrup Rural, Amingaon, Near SBI Amingaon Branch, North Guwahati, Assam

description: AS-26 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Chirang district in Assam, specifically serving the Bodoland Territorial Region. The office facilitates motor vehicle registrations, license issuance, and enforcement of transport regulations across the district.
address: District Transport Office, Dhaligaon Village, Opposite BRPL Main Gate, Chirang, Assam

description: AS-27 is the official District Transport Office (DTO) serving Udalguri district in Assam. It operates under the Bodoland Territorial Region and manages vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and enforcement of transport regulations.
address: DTO Udalguri, Block Road, Ward No-3, Udalguri, Assam

description: The AS-28 RTO serves the Baksa district in Assam, with its headquarters located in Mushalpur. It is an active District Transport Office (DTO) responsible for vehicle registrations, licensing, and road safety enforcement within the Bodoland Territorial Region.
address: District Transport Office, Musalpur Kadamtal Road, P.O. Musalpur, District: Baksa, Assam

description: AS-29 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Majuli, India's first river island district. Established in 2018 following Majuli's upgrade to a district, it manages vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for the island's unique geographical terrain.
address: District Transport Office, Kamalabari, Majuli, Assam

description: AS-30 is a specialized RTO code dedicated to the Assam Police department for its state-wide fleet of vehicles. It operates under the administration of the District Transport Office in Guwahati, managing all registration and documentation for police-owned assets.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer, East Zone (Kamrup Metro), Hengarabari, Guwahati, Assam

description: AS-31 is the Regional Transport Office (RTO) serving the Hojai district in Assam. Established after Hojai was declared a separate district in 2015, this office handles vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for the local region.
address: District Transport Office, Hojai, Assam

description: AS-32 is the District Transport Office (DTO) serving the Biswanath district of Assam. It was established following the district's creation in 2015 and manages all regional vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permit services for the area.
address: District Transport Office, Biswanath Chariali, Biswanath, Assam

description: AS-33 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Charaideo district of Assam, with its administrative headquarters located in Sonari. It was established following the creation of Charaideo district in 2015 to handle vehicle registration, licensing, and transport law enforcement for the local population.
address: District Transport Office, Sonari, District Charaideo, Assam

description: The AS-34 RTO serves the South Salmara-Mankachar district in Assam, with its administrative headquarters located in Hatsingimari. This District Transport Office (DTO) was established following the creation of the new district to manage vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport enforcement in the riverine border area.
address: District Transport Office, Jatio Vidyalaya Road, Hatsingimari, South Salmara-Mankachar, Assam
